{% set custom_date_for_split_tax_component = frappe.db.get_value('Payroll Entry', doc.payroll_entry, ['custom_date_for_split_tax_component']) %} {% if custom_date_for_split_tax_component %} {% set date_convert = custom_date_for_split_tax_component|string %} {% else %} {% set date_convert = doc.posting_date|string %} {% endif %} {% set date_parts = date_convert.split('-') %} {% set year = date_parts[0] | int%} {% set month = date_parts[1] %} {% set day = date_parts[2] | int %} {% set month_en = { '01': 'January', '02': 'February', '03': 'March', '04': 'April', '05': 'May', '06': 'June', '07': 'July', '08': 'August', '09': 'September', '10': 'October', '11': 'November', '12': 'December' }[month] %} {% set total_income = namespace(result=0) %}
{% set custom_first_name_en, custom_last_name_en, bank_name, bank_ac_no, department, designation, prefix = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', doc.employee, ['custom_first_name_en', 'custom_last_name_en', 'custom_bank', 'bank_ac_no', 'department', 'designation', 'custom_prefix_en']) %} {% set emp_name_en = custom_first_name_en + ' ' + custom_last_name_en %} {% if designation %} {% set designation_en = frappe.db.get_value('Designation', designation, 'custom_designation_en') %} {% else %} {% set designation_en = '' %} {% endif %} {% if bank_name %} {% set bank_name_en = frappe.db.get_value('Bank', bank_name, ['custom_bank_name_en']) %} {% else %} {% set bank_name_en = '' %} {% endif %}
{% if doc.custom_split_tax_deduction_on %} {% set earningsData = frappe.get_all('Salary Detail', filters={'parent': doc.name, 'parentfield': 'earnings', 'salary_component': doc.custom_split_tax_deduction_on}, fields=['name', 'salary_component', 'amount', 'parentfield']) %} {% else %} {% set earningsData = frappe.get_all('Salary Detail', filters={'parent': doc.name, 'parentfield': 'earnings'}, fields=['name', 'salary_component', 'amount', 'parentfield']) %} {% endif %} {% set deductionsData = frappe.get_all('Salary Detail', filters={'parent': doc.name, 'parentfield': 'deductions'}, fields=['name','salary_component', 'amount', 'parentfield']) %}
{% for earning in earningsData %} {% set total_income.result = total_income.result + earning.amount| default(0, true) %} {% endfor %}
